entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Marble Mountain

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow or rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Wet snow or rain changing to periods of snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023
